title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Between 2021 and 2023, he served as Argentina's Minister of Security in the cabinet of President Alberto Fernández. He has held several cabinet positions under three presidents, serving in these offices for a total of over nine years.

title: Aníbal Fernández fue elegido al frente del Comité Latinoamericano de Seguridad Interior | Argentina.gob.ar
snippet: El ministro de Seguridad de la Nación, Aníbal Fernández, fue elegido hoy al frente del Comité Latinoamericano de Seguridad Interior (CLASI) que reúne a los ministros del área de países de América Latina, actualmente reunidos en Bruselas ...

title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: Chief of the Cabinet of Ministers and Candidate for Governor of the Province of Buenos Aires (Frente para la Victoria) Aníbal Fernández is a candidate for governor of the Province of Buenos Aires and currently chief of staff of the Minister’s ...

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: In 2021, he was appointed as Minister of Security. This happened as part of changes in the government after the 2021 legislative primary elections. He served in this role until December 2023.

title: Argentina - Politics
snippet: Alberto Fernandez is not to be confused with former Justice Minister Anibal Fernandez (AF), whom Argentine President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner's (CFK) promoted to Cabinet Chief in September 2009.
